fixes.name: [Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD) Abs] / TOTAL([Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD) Abs])
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR currentValue = ABS( SUM( 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)] ) )
VAR totalValue = CALCULATE(
    ABS( SUM( 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)] ) ),
    ALL( 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)' )
)
RETURN
DIVIDE( currentValue, totalValue )
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau expression to DAX by expanding the referenced calculated field 'Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD) Abs' into ABS(SUM(...)) and replacing the Tableau TOTAL(...) table calculation with CALCULATE(..., ALL(table)) to compute the grand total over the table. All column references were transformed to the 'TableName'[Column] format.
